org.qscript.errors

Class ScriptException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.qscript.errors.ScriptException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EvaluationException, SyntaxException

    public abstract class ScriptException
extends Exception
    The parent class for all exceptions thrown by the QScript library classes..

    Peter Lager
